TopicTitle: Kerbal parachute visible when on EVA

Articles.Content:
Whenever I EVA on the ground or in space, the kerbal parachute is always visible, but transparent. 

I installed GPP on version 1.4.5 through ckan, and only installed what it insisted installing.

here's what I mean: https://imgur.com/a/7n6qlUj

Please help

Edited February 13, 2020 by Dr.Krentist
So I found the answer, I had to uninstall breaking ground, (Or in my case, just move the file onto my desktop) and everything fixed itself.
